text: True Fasts and Sabbaths
“Call with \add the\add* throat; you must not keep back!
lift up your voice like \add a\add* trumpet,
and declare\f + \fr 58:1 \ft Or “announce” \f* to my people their rebellion,
and to the house of Jacob their sins.
Yet\f + \fr 58:2 \ft Or “And” \f* they seek me day \add by\add* day,
and they desire the knowledge of my ways
like a nation that ⸤practiced⸥\f + \fr 58:2 \ft Literally “did” \f* righteousness,
and had not forsaken the judgment of its God;
they ask me for ⸤righteous judgments⸥,\f + \fr 58:2 \ft Literally “judgments of righteousness” \f*
they desire the closeness of God.
‘Why do we fast, and you do not see \add it\add*?
We humiliate our soul, and you do not notice \add it\add*?’
Look! You find delight on the day of your fast,
and you oppress all your workers!
Look! You fast to quarrel and strife,
and to strike with a ⸤wicked fist⸥.\f + \fr 58:4 \ft Literally “fist of wickedness” \f*
You shall not fast as \add you do\add* ⸤today⸥,\f + \fr 58:4 \ft Literally “the day” \f*
to ⸤make your voice heard⸥\f + \fr 58:4 \ft Literally “cause to hear your voice” \f* on the height.
Is \add the\add* fast I choose like this,
a day for humankind to humiliate ⸤himself⸥\f + \fr 58:5 \ft Literally “his soul” \f*?
To bow his head like a reed,
and ⸤make⸥\f + \fr 58:5 \ft Literally “he makes” \f* his bed \add on\add* sackcloth and ashes;
you call this a fast
and a day of pleasure to Yahweh?
Is this not \add the\add* fast I choose: to release \add the\add* bonds of injustice,
to untie \add the\add* ropes of \add the\add* yoke,
and to let \add the\add* oppressed go free,
and ⸤tear⸥\f + \fr 58:6 \ft Literally “you must tear” \f* every yoke to pieces?
\add Is it\add* not to break your bread for the hungry?
You must bring ⸤home⸥\f + \fr 58:7 \ft Literally “a house” \f* \add the\add* poor, \add the\add* homeless.
When you see \add the\add* naked, you must cover him,
and you must not hide yourself from your ⸤relatives⸥.\f + \fr 58:7 \ft Literally “flesh” \f*
Then your light shall break forth like the dawn,
and your healing shall grow quickly.
And your salvation shall go before you;
the glory of Yahweh will be your rear guard.
Then you shall call, and Yahweh himself will answer.
You shall cry for help, and he will say, ‘Here I \add am\add*!’
If you remove from among you \add the\add* yoke,
the ⸤finger-pointing⸥\f + \fr 58:9 \ft Literally “stretching out of \fq the \ft finger” \f* and ⸤evil speech⸥,\f + \fr 58:9 \ft Literally “the speaking of evil” \f*
if\f + \fr 58:10 \ft Or “and” \f* you offer your soul to the hungry,
and you satisfy \add the\add* appetite of \add the\add* afflicted,
then\f + \fr 58:10 \ft Or “and” \f* your light shall rise in the darkness,
and your darkness \add will be\add* like noon.
And Yahweh will lead you continually, and satisfy your soul in a barren land,
and he will strengthen your bones,
and you shall be like a well-watered garden,
and like a spring of water whose water does not fail.
And they shall rebuild ancient ruins from you;
you shall erect \add the\add* foundations of ⸤many generations,⸥\f + \fr 58:12 \ft Literally “generation and generation” \f*
and ⸤you shall be called⸥\f + \fr 58:12 \ft Literally “shall be called to you” \f* \add the\add* bricklayer \add of\add* \add the\add* breach,
\add the\add* restorer of paths to live \add in\add*.
If you hold your foot back from \add the\add* Sabbath,
\add from\add* doing your affairs on ⸤my holy day⸥,\f + \fr 58:13 \ft Literally “the day of my holiness” \f*
if\f + \fr 58:13 \ft Or “and” \f* you call the Sabbath a pleasure,
the holy \add day\add* of Yahweh honorable,
if\f + \fr 58:13 \ft Literally “and” \f* you honor him ⸤more than⸥\f + \fr 58:13 \ft Literally “from” \f* doing your ways,
than finding your affairs\f + \fr 58:13 \ft Hebrew “affair” \f* and speaking a word,
then you shall take your pleasure in\f + \fr 58:14 \ft Or “on” \f* Yahweh,
and I will make you ride upon \add the\add* heights of \add the\add* earth,
and I will feed you the heritage of Jacob your ancestor,\f + \fr 58:14 \ft Or “father” \f*
for the mouth of Yahweh has spoken.”
